done

```
#!/bin/bash
PLACES_LIST=''Madrid Boston Singapore World''
for PLACE in ${PLACES_LIST}; do
    if [ ${PLACE} = ''Madrid'' ]; then
        echo ''¡Hola ${PLACE}!''
    fi
done
```

```
[root@rhel8 ~]# ./hello.sh 
¡Hola Madrid!
```

```
#!/bin/bash
PLACES_LIST=''Madrid Boston Singapore World''
for PLACE in ${PLACES_LIST}; do
    if [ ${PLACE} = ''Madrid'' ]; then
        echo ''¡Hola ${PLACE}!''
    else
        echo ''hello ${PLACE}!''
    fi
done
```

```
[root@rhel8 ~]# ./hello.sh 
¡Hola Madrid!
hello Boston!
hello Singapore!
hello World!
```
